Jayde::

Jayde has indeed been playing possum to some extent, although she IS 
wounded.  She scrambles aside as Spike comes her way, pulling out her 
nailgun and sending a barrage of her own spikes after her opponent.  
Her right arm hangs useless, the shoulder badly damaged.  However, 
her left shoulder and arm - with which she holds her weapon - are 
intact, as is the (plainly visible) black-skull insignia of the 
Rogues on that shoulder.

Devilcat/Riekan/Torin::

"... so that's the story," Torin finishes up as the trio nears their 
destination.

"I see.  You did what you had to."  Devilcat is perfectly willing to 
forgive letting Phoenix go free - it was what he'd had in mind to do 
eventually anyhow, in a way.  "Now, unless my optics deceive me, we 
have a comrade to rescue."  The three of them pull out their 
respective weapons and dive, decloaking as they descend upon the 
warrior attacking their fellow Rogue to the tune of Devilcat's fierce 
war-cry.
